settings.tagline: Everything you need for healthy eating all semester long
settings.features:
• ✓ Everything in Quick Prep Pack
  • ✓ Full 16-week semester meal planner
  • ✓ 200+ recipes with video tutorials
  • ✓ Dorm-friendly & apartment recipes
  • ✓ Weekly automated shopping schedules
  • ✓ Detailed nutrition breakdowns
  • ✓ Student community access (Discord)

settings.testimonial_text: This is THE plan for college students. I meal prep on Sundays and I'm set for the week. My roommates are jealous!
